document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">lay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Days </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">between </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Behind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Slow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">watched </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Grains </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">shore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">imperceptible </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">note </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A night there lay the days between
